transcript.text: and it shall come to pass that Yahshua
shall rule and reign from Jerusalem for
thousand years
[Music]
but dumb shall speak and the blind shall
see and the lame shall jump and leap as
the heart and no man shall beat their
swords into plowshares they won't learn
war anymore Yahshua will rule from
Jerusalem he will rule with a rod of
iron and he will rule for a thousand
years for a thousand years Satan will be
bound in that pit and Yahshua he will be
crowned the king he will make Yahoo
shall I he prays in all the earth angels
dancing banners waving people shouting
and praising peace fills the earth and
the Torah shall go forth
from Zion Yahshua will rule and reign
forever and he will take up his awesome
throne for a thousand years he's gonna
rule for a thousand years and all
nations will come up to Jerusalem every
year for the feast of Sukkot for a
five-cent years it says it in Zechariah
14 a thousand years the knowledge of
Yahweh will fill the earth and all
creation groans for this day Yahshua
[Music]
will reign and he will rule the blind
will see the lame will dance the lion
and the lamb will lay down together
peace will rule and the knowledge of
will fill the earth manners wave people
praise all creation shouts and cries
triumphant all hail to the king Yahshua
he will rule the carpenter from Nazareth
is now made King he will sit upon his
throne and rule not after the sight of
his eyes but with truth and justice
equity and salvation will go forth from
Zion we will rule with him as kings and
priests and all the world will sing to
Yahshua the trees were clapping and the
stars will sing all to Yahshua
